hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]

sentences.english: I like to see you right when I made a small temper the expression of how the people like.

sentences.english: Tend your tadpoles. You never know when you might need a pal.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了你的发小，说不准什么时候你会需要伙伴。
